price: وېلې د آسمانو، ځمكې او د هغو تر منځ د ټولو شيانو پالونكى، كه تاسو باور كوونكي ياست.
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
